video.title: Guy's Grocery Games
video.synopsis: Four chefs compete in a cooking challenge inside a grocery store, but they face ingredient shortages, devious obstacles and a merciless time crunch.

episodes.synopsis: Competing for charity, four Food Network stars must create lunch with five ingredients or fewer, then cook using only one ingredient from each aisle.
episodes.title: Food Network Stars Take Over

episodes.synopsis: The chefs are forced to include marshmallows in their lunches, then try to figure out a taco meal using Guy's grocery list.
episodes.title: Marshmallow Madness

episodes.synopsis: Chefs have to make appetizing skewers out of items from the clearance carts, then spin the wheel to learn how much they can spend on a fancy dinner.
episodes.title: Fry, Fry Again

episodes.synopsis: The chefs must cook with food that's mislabeled or even unlabeled, then test their strength by carrying as much food as they can for a challenge.
episodes.title: Cart to Table

episodes.synopsis: Chefs are forced to make their best international dish using only the contents of the Clearance Carts, then take on the ABC letter challenge.
episodes.title: Around the World in Three Carts

episodes.synopsis: Guy invites Food Network personalities to compete, and they must use their spelling skills as well as their cooking talents to win money for charity.
episodes.title: All-Stars Take to the Aisles

episodes.synopsis: Chefs from "Diners, Drive-ins and Dives" compete, making comfort food from an odd grocery list and cooking dinner using damaged ingredients.
episodes.title: Triple D Takes on Triple G

episodes.synopsis: In this Halloween episode, the chefs face a frightening Red Light Special, then Guy makes them use ingredients like bone marrow and blood orange.
episodes.title: Aisle of Terror

episodes.synopsis: The chefs have to make a high-class seafood meal using five ingredients or fewer, then play a fan-inspired game and take on a burger challenge.
episodes.title: Fan-Tastic Food

episodes.synopsis: Four chefs have to make a great grilled meal on a tight budget. The chefs make a big breakfast using peanut butter and jelly.
episodes.title: Not Going to Budge-It

episodes.synopsis: The chefs have to impress the judges with seasonal Thanksgiving ingredients, then make game-day bites with frozen cranberries.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving Grocery Trot

episodes.synopsis: The chefs have to use Guy's grocery list to find ingredients for a panini, and the final pair compete in a seafood battle.
episodes.title: Pressed for Time

episodes.synopsis: The chefs have to watch their weight when shopping for a meat dish, then leave their fate up to the food wheel in an all-American lunch challenge.
episodes.title: The Weighting Game
